rows.label: tlk45500153_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Here's a bit of gossip I heard
at the baths.

rows.label: tlk45500153_02_msg0002
rows.name:
You know that ruckus that went down
in Alba Margen at night? Apparently
an artificial Blade was behind it.

rows.label: tlk45500153_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Creating Blades from machinery, can
you believe it? The things technology
can do these days!

rows.label: tlk45500153_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Actually, something just occurred
to me.

rows.label: tlk45500153_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Since we have more Core Crystals than
compatible users, wouldn't it be more
efficient to make artificial Drivers?
